resources.string: CHOOSE A CAR FROM THE LIST:

The SmartCar understands both simple voice commands and more complex ones, that specify both direction, speed and angle in one sentence

 The SmartCar can:
 - Move forward
 - Reverse\ - Stop
 - Change speed
 - Turn left and right
 - Specify degrees for turning

 F.e. Turn right with 40 degrees and speed 30
